TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void GCMicroGamepadValueChangedHandler(GCMicroGamepad gamepad, GCControllerElement element);
.class public auto ansi sealed GCMicroGamepadValueChangedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The profile that contains the changed element.
Docs.summary: A handler that is called whenever any single element of a controller changes.

remarks.para: This handler is called once for each element change. It is only called for directly attached elements.
